name: Basic Education & Learning
description:
Hello dear player! School, mmmm, what do you think about this place?
Are you ready for an amazing scenarios of mixed levels with Saldi? You'll have to solve many problems while escaping the class rooms... Look carefully for tips we prepared for you. Remember! Do not collide with other students and teachers, otherwise you will lose speed.

If you find our game funny, please send us your feedback. We'll collect each your idea and best of these scenarios you'll see in future updates.

Good luck & Have Fun!
